verses.verse: Then he <S%H7121>cried<s%> in mine <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Cause ye them that have <S%H6486>charge<s%> over the <S%H5892>city<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4892>destroying<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H8337>behold<s%>, six <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, which <S%H6437>lieth<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4660>slaughter<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, with a <S%H5608>writer<s%>'s <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>. And they went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, whereupon it <S%H4670>was<s%>, to the threshold of the <S%H1004>house<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, who had the <S%H5608>writer<s%>'s <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5674>him<s%>, Go through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H8427>set<s%> a <S%H8420>mark<s%> upon the <S%H4696>foreheads<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H584>sigh<s%> and that <S%H602>cry<s%> over all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that are <S%H6213>done<s%> in the midst <S%H8432>thereof<s%>.

And to the <S%H428>others<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing<s%>, <S%H5674>Go<s%> ye through the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5221>him<s%>, and smite: let not your <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither have ye <S%H2550>pity<s%>;

slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H4889>utterly<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H970>man<s%>, the young man and the <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, and little <S%H2945>children<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>; but come not <S%H5066>near<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> upon whom is the <S%H8420>mark<s%>: and <S%H2490>begin<s%> at my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>. Then they <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2930>them<s%>, Defile the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H2691>courts<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain<s%>: go ye <S%H3318>forth<s%>. And they went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And it came to <S%H5221>pass<s%>, while they were smiting, and I was <S%H7604>left<s%>, that I <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H2199>cried<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>! wilt thou <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in thy pouring <S%H8210>out<s%> of thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H5771>me<s%>, The iniquity of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4297>wresting<s%> of <S%H559>judgment<s%>: for they say, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> seeth <S%H7200>not<s%>.
And as for me <S%H5869>also<s%>, mine eye shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I have <S%H2550>pity<s%>, but I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> upon their <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And <S%H376>behold<s%>, the man <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, who had the <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side<s%>, <S%H7725>reported<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I have <S%H6213>done<s%> as thou hast commanded <S%H6680>me<s%>.
